statements: SELECT * FROM bioenergy_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM bioenergy_projects WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, cost, revenue FROM bioenergy_projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM bioenergy_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC, cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM bioenergy_projects WHERE cost > 10000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT project_name, cost FROM bioenergy_projects WHERE end_date < '2025-01-01' AND revenue > cost;
SELECT AVG(cost) AS avg_cost, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM bioenergy_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, cost, revenue FROM bioenergy_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CostData;
SELECT project_name, cost_amount FROM CostData WHERE cost_amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, cost_category, cost_amount FROM CostData WHERE cost_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT project_name, cost_category, cost_amount FROM CostData ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM CostData GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, cost_amount FROM CostData WHERE cost_category = 'Labor' ORDER BY cost_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM CostData GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, revenue_amount FROM RevenueProjections WHERE revenue_category = 'Sales' ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, AVG(revenue_amount) AS avg_revenue FROM RevenueProjections GROUP BY project_name HAVING avg_revenue > 5000;

SELECT project_name, cost_amount, revenue_amount FROM CostData c JOIN RevenueProjections r ON c.project_name = r.project_name WHERE cost_amount > revenue_amount ORDER BY cost_amount - revenue_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CostData WHERE cost_type = 'material'
SELECT project_name, cost_amount FROM CostData ORDER BY cost_amount DESC
SELECT project_name, cost_amount FROM CostData WHERE cost_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM RevenueProjections WHERE revenue_type = 'sales'
SELECT project_name, revenue_amount FROM RevenueProjections ORDER BY revenue_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM CostData WHERE cost_amount > 10000 ORDER BY cost_amount DESC
SELECT project_name, cost_type FROM CostData WHERE project_name = 'Project A'
SELECT project_name, revenue_amount FROM RevenueProjections WHERE revenue_type = 'Sales' AND revenue_amount < 5000
SELECT * FROM BioEnergyProjects WHERE project_description LIKE '%renewable%'
SELECT project_name, cost_amount, revenue_amount FROM CostData INNER JOIN RevenueProjections ON CostData.project_name = RevenueProjections.project_name
SELECT * FROM CostData;
SELECT id, labor_costs, overhead_costs FROM CostData WHERE material_costs > 1000;
SELECT project_name, projected_revenue, profit_margin FROM RevenueProjections ORDER BY projected_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProjectStatus WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, initial_investment, payback_period FROM InvestmentReturns WHERE initial_investment < 50000 ORDER BY initial_investment ASC;
SELECT id, project_name, labor_costs FROM CostData ORDER BY labor_costs DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, material_costs, overhead_costs FROM CostData WHERE material_costs > 1000 ORDER BY material_costs ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RevenueProjections WHERE profit_margin > 0.2 ORDER BY projected_revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, status, completion_date FROM ProjectStatus WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY completion_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, initial_investment, annual_returns FROM InvestmentReturns WHERE initial_investment > 50000 ORDER BY annual_returns DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM project_details;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_details WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, category, cost FROM cost_data ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT project_id, team_member, role FROM project_teams WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY team_member ASC;
SELECT project_id, year, revenue FROM revenue_projections WHERE year > 2020;
SELECT project_id, category, cost FROM cost_data WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_projections WHERE year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2022 ORDER BY revenue ASC, year DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_details WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT team_member, role, project_id FROM project_teams WHERE role = 'Developer' ORDER BY team_member ASC;
SELECT project_id, status, last_updated FROM project_status WHERE status IN ('In Progress', 'On Hold') ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
